name: Transmogrification 0.9.6
description:
This mod allows you to change appearance of epic armor without changing of it properties. It works similar as transmogrification in WoW just for epic armor.

It does not affect balance of items. Just appearance.

You can change any (or almost) epic armor but with following rules:
- Type of armor should be the same (heavy -> heavy, medium -> medium, ligth -> light)
- Equip slot should be the same (boots -> boots, etc)
- Epic armor what you want to change, can be exceptional or flawless
- Armor, appearance which you want to apply, has not to be flawless or exceptional
- Not supported base armor from trait Armorer

Example of usage:

Build Transmogrificator (need to learn trait on 60 lvl)

Now you need transmogrification gem. You can create it using :
Heart of a Hero (or Heart of the Kinscourge) + 10 Radium Gem = 5 Transmogrification gem

After that put into transmogrificator :

Epic Cimmerian Steel Pauldron (id 52562) + Simple Vanir Heavy Pauldron (id 52557) + Transmogrification gem = Epic Cimmerian Steel Pauldron (with new appearance of Vanir Heavy Pauldron)

Now try to equip it.
Rest of receipts the same: Epic Armor (1) + Simple Armor (2) (the same slot and type) + Transmogrification gem = Epic Armor (1) with appearance (2)

Note: proccess can no be undone and not possible change appearance again for transmogrificated item

Note: After transmogrification icon of the item will not be changed, but when you equip it, you will see changes.

Note: Technically this mod creates new armor, so if you delete this mod, all transmogrificated items will be lost.
